title: Image/Text: Youth Interprets the News
short_description: In collaboration with the National Museum of Mexican Art, the Art Institute exhibits work from the Posada Teen Partnership Program. Teen artists from the National Museum of Mexican Art’s Yollocalli Arts Reach program visited the exhibition José Guadalupe Posada and the Mexican Broadside at the Art Institute, explored the sociopolitical context of his work, and participated in an eight-week intaglio workshop at Yollocalli’s Pilsen-based studio.
